awd_titl_txt: Field-Defect Interactions and Electromechanical Behavior    in Piezoelectric Multilayer Structures
awd_abstract_narration: The research will study the overall electromechanical behavior of               laminated structures, and interaction of electric fields with                   material inhomogeneities.  The stress behavior at the interface                 between dielectric-dielectric and dielectric-electroconducting                  layers which may be induced by external mechanical loads or by                  application of high voltages.  Elastic and electric fields near                 cracks, voids and inclusions will be established using complex                  variable approach.  The ultimate aim is to predict the                          performance of piezoceramic multilayer structures.
org_div_long_name: Division of Civil, Mechanical, and Manufacturing Innovation
